name: Alien Colony Invasion Attack: Galaxy Space Puzzle Quest
name_original: Alien Colony Invasion Attack: Galaxy Space Puzzle Quest
description:
Leaping lizards! Err...or leaping aliens in this case! If you're ready to play a game that literally keeps you bouncing and doesn't slow down then you've come to the right place. This game is non-stop action that won't let you down!

Fun and addicting, leap from one floater to another in this game that's part strategy, part skill. You'll test your dexterity and tactical skills as you try to corner your guy on just one landing pad in the middle. It's not as easy as you think, but that's part of the fun!

Just don't jump off the board or it's game over!

To eliminate the landing pads from the game to help your chances, tap on them. The longer you play and the higher your levels go, the harder the game will get! Challenge yourself to see how far YOU can make it!

With fun, colorful graphics and multiple levels you won't want to put this one down!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
